Package com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.sort.helper

Class Instrumenter

java.lang.Object
com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.sort.helper.Instrumenter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Instrument
public class Instrumenter extends Object implements Instrument
The Instrumenter class implements the Instrument interface and is used to record and analyze specific metrics during the execution of algorithms, such as the number of copies, swaps, comparisons, fixes, hits, and lookups.

  • Constructor Details

    • Instrumenter

      public Instrumenter(boolean countCopies, boolean countSwaps, boolean countCompares, boolean countFixes, boolean countHits, boolean countLookups, boolean showStats)
      Constructs an Instrumenter instance with the specified options for tracking counts and statistics display.
      Parameters:
      countCopies - whether to count the number of copies during instrumentation.
      countSwaps - whether to count the number of swaps during instrumentation.
      countCompares - whether to count the number of comparisons during instrumentation.
      countFixes - whether to count the number of fixes during instrumentation.
      countHits - whether to count array hits during instrumentation.
      countLookups - whether to count lookups during instrumentation.
      showStats - whether to display collected statistics.

    • Instrumenter

      public Instrumenter(Config config)
      Constructs an Instrumenter instance configured using the provided Config object.
      Parameters:
      config - the Config object containing settings for toggling specific instrumentation features, such as counting copies, swaps, compares, fixes, hits, lookups, and whether to show statistics.

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init(int n, int nRuns)
      Initializes the instrumenter with a specific size and number of runs, and sets up necessary statistics tracking if not already initialized.
      Specified by:
      init in interface Instrument
      Parameters:
      n - the size parameter, typically representing the size of the dataset being tested.
      nRuns - the number of runs for which statistics will be gathered.

    • getStatPack

      public StatPack getStatPack()
      Retrieves the StatPack object associated with this instrumenter. The StatPack contains statistical tracking data for various operations performed during the instrumentation process, such as counts of certain events or measurements of performance metrics.
      Specified by:
      getStatPack in interface Instrument
      Returns:
      the StatPack instance containing the tracked statistical data.

    • getHits

      public long getHits()
      Retrieves the current value of the hits counter. The hits counter typically tracks the number of array accesses that may be performed during instrumentation.
      Specified by:
      getHits in interface Instrument
      Returns:
      the number of hits recorded as a long.

    • getLookups

      public long getLookups()
      Retrieves the number of lookups counted by the instrumenter.
      Specified by:
      getLookups in interface Instrument
      Returns:
      the total number of lookups recorded.

    • getCopies

      Specified by:
      getCopies in interface Instrument
      Returns:
      the number of copies performed as a long value.

    • getCompares

      public long getCompares()
      Retrieves the current count of comparisons made during instrumentation. The value represents the number of operations where elements have been compared.
      Specified by:
      getCompares in interface Instrument
      Returns:
      the total number of comparisons made.

    • incrementCompares

      public void incrementCompares()
      Increments the comparison counter if comparison counting is enabled. This method checks if the `countCompares` flag is true, and if so, increases the `compares` counter by one. It is used for tracking the number of comparisons made during certain operations.
      Specified by:
      incrementCompares in interface Instrument

    • incrementSwaps

      public void incrementSwaps(int n)
      Increments the number of swaps by the specified value if the instrumenter is configured to count swaps.
      Specified by:
      incrementSwaps in interface Instrument
      Parameters:
      n - the number of swaps to increment by.

    • gatherStatistic

      public void gatherStatistic()
      Description copied from interface: Instrument
      Collects and records statistical data related to various operations such as swaps, comparisons, copies, inversions, fixes, hits, and lookups. This method is typically used to aggregate and store the current metrics for later analysis or reporting.
      Specified by:
      gatherStatistic in interface Instrument

    • countFixes

      public boolean countFixes()
      Determines whether fixes should be counted during the instrumentation process.
      Specified by:
      countFixes in interface Instrument
      Returns:
      true if fixes are being counted, false otherwise.

    • isShowStats

      public boolean isShowStats()
      Determines whether statistics display is enabled.
      Specified by:
      isShowStats in interface Instrument
      Returns:
      true if the display of statistics is enabled; false otherwise.
